__e: My dream... is of eternity with you.
A little of you is worth a lifetime with any other woman.
You can't take his love to eternity with you.
We have eternity... to know your flesh...
Nothing left but all the time in the world to think about it.
You've got all eternity to make up your mind.
You know, sometimes I lose eternity in the passing instant:
A window to the next channel. If you think I'm spending the rest of eternity here, you're crazy!
into eternity ... in sickness and in health.
